title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.6 - Copies of New York State income tax returns, schedules and statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.6 - Copies of New York State income tax returns, schedules and statements

State Regulations

Every person who is required by this Subchapter, or by
instructions applicable to any form prescribed by this Subchapter, to keep a
copy of any New York State income tax return, schedule, statement or other
document, must keep such copy as a part of his records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
158.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
